conversation.question: How many table(s) are in this room?
How many sofa(s) are in this room?
How many fridge(s) are in this room?
How many lamp(s) are in this room?
How many basket(s) are in this room?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (sofa, window, fridge, table) is the closest to the basket in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (lamp, chair, basket, fridge) is the closest to the trash_can in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (cabinet, window, sofa, basket) is the closest to the fridge in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (trash_can, tv, lamp, window) is the closest to the basket in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (fridge, lamp, rug, table) is the closest to the basket in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the fridge and facing the closest sofa, is the closest table to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the trash_can and facing the closest lamp, is the closest sofa to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the fridge and facing the closest rug, is the closest trash_can to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the fridge and facing the closest window, is the closest trash_can to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
